text: Kwa Iye nonse mudzabwerera. Lonjezo la Mulungu ndi loona. Iye ndiye adayamba kulenga zolengedwa zonse ndipo pomaliza adzazipatsanso moyo kuti adzawalipire mwa chilungamo onse amene adakhulupirira mwa Iye ndipo ankachita ntchito zabwino. Anthu osakhulupirira adzamwa zakumwa zamadzi ogaduka ndi kulandira chilango chowawa chifukwa chosakhulupirira
